Package clientGUIControllers

Class ViewCatalogController

java.lang.Object
clientGUIControllers.ViewCatalogController
public class ViewCatalogController extends Object
ViewCatalogController is a JavaFX controller class that handles the user interface of the view catalog screen in the client application. It displays a grid of products and allows the user to select a category to view, log out, and navigate back to the previous screen.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This method is called when the class is initialized, it sets the images for the different elements of the screen, sets the items for the select category combo box, and retrieves the list of products from the server.

    • initLater

      private void initLater()
      This method retrieves the list of products from the DB and sets them on the grid.

    • setProductOnGrid

      private void setProductOnGrid(int i, Product product) throws IOException
      This method sets a product on the grid using a FXMLLoader, it loads the ProductViewScreen.fxml file, sets the data for the product and adds it to the grid.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the product in the list.
      product - the product to be set on the grid.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • threadToSetOnGrid

      private void threadToSetOnGrid(int i, Product p)
      This method creates a new thread that calls the setProductOnGrid method for a specific product and index.
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the product in the list.
      p - the product to be set on the grid.

    • selectFilter

      public void selectFilter(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method filters the products in the grid based on the selected category. and sets the corresponding image to be visible.
      Parameters:
      event - the event that triggered the method call.

    • getProductsList

      public ArrayList<Product> getProductsList()
      This method returns the current list of products being displayed in the view catalog screen.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of products.

    • setProductsList

      public void setProductsList(ArrayList<Product> ProductsList)
      This method sets the current list of products to be displayed in the view catalog screen.
      Parameters:
      ProductsList -

    • logOutPressed

      void logOutPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method handles the event when the log out button is pressed. It calls the logOutPressed method of the CommonActionsController.
      Parameters:
      event - the event that triggered the method call

    • xPressed

      void xPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method handles the event when the X button is pressed. It calls the xPressed method of the CommonActionsController.
      Parameters:
      event - the event that triggered the method call.

    • backPressed

      void backPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method handles the event when the back button is pressed. It calls the backOrNextPressed method of the CommonActionsController with the appropriate fxml file location according to the appropriate role.
      Parameters:
      event - the event that triggered the method call.

    • setImages

      private void setImages()
      Set images
